name: Only One (itch)
description:
ONLY ONE Hack & Die

We created Only One  as our entry for the 2019 GMTK game jam. 

The theme was Only One and so we decided to make a turn based isometric dungeon crawler with rogue like elements inspired by the likes of "darkness dungeon"  and "into the breach".

In Only One you play as an immensely powerful Evil Mage hiding inside his dungeon who got bored of never facing any real threats. And so you chooses to help the random parties of adventurers that dare to enter your place in order to train them and maybe finally find a rightful opponent.

But the guild of dungeon masters is surveying you and you can only give one advice to the team per rooms.

Will you get to fight against the ones that once were your prodigies, or will they fail miserably before even being able of reaching you... find out for yourself by playing Only One. 

As of right now only our 2D basic isometric demo is live but we are currently working on a 3D  version of the game that should hit Itch.io pretty soon.

dev : MAGRY Valentin
